attributes.action: Abolish the breed specific legislation law
attributes.background: The Breed specific legislation law is killing many poor innocent family pets it is unfair how every dog is being judged by its breed and not on it's individual behaviour.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104925 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
